title: Drawing, "Sketches for "Lesson of Charity" and portrait of Peter Richards, Jr.", 1849
description: Man seated in an armchair, turned toward the right, an open book in his right hand. Bust of a child facing frontally, right, and a head of a child (see verso) superimposed. Center, name of man, lower left. Verso: Head of a child: "Charlie: for "Lesson of Charity," facing away, left. Name and date on lower right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketches for "Lesson of Charity" and portrait of Peter Richards, Jr.", 1849.
1849. Graphite on cream paper. Bequest of Erskine Hewitt. 1942-50-632.
